title: Train Sim World® 5: The Holiday Express - Runaway Elf
description: With Train Sim World 3: The Holiday Express - Runaway Elf, drive a model locomotive around a nostalgic 1980s living room and complete unique challenges before Christmas Morning arrives! Can you stop the mischievous Elf from ruining the big day?
longDescription:
**TSW Compatible content released for a previous Train Sim World® - features may remain unchanged from the original release and may not make use of all newer core features.**

Experience the joy of the festive season with Train Sim World 3: The Holiday Express - Runaway Elf; drive a model locomotive around a nostalgic 1980s living room and complete unique challenges before Christmas Morning arrives! Can you stop the mischievous Elf from ruining the big day?

As the sun sets one cosy Christmas Eve,
A troublesome Elf has a trick up their sleeve.
Presents and toys have been scattered around the room,
If they’re not in place by morning, it’ll spell certain doom!

Spring to the rescue, deliver gifts back under the tree,
Drive Model Rail classics, the miniature F7A and F7B.
Around a network that sprawls through a 1980s home,
The fireplace and TV are just some locations you can roam.

With no less than 7 different scenarios set throughout the night,
Do you have what it takes to have everything put right?
Using flat cars aplenty you may shuttle along nickel rail,
Hauling goodies and treats recreated in stunning detail.

The F7? Easy to drive, a simple DC model gauge Streamliner,
Carrying Richie Rails stickers, or whatever you want in Livery Designer.

The route? Homely and festive, a sight for warmth-seeking eyes,
With Scenario Planner you can make any train you wish model-size.

Share your creations online through the power of Dovetail Live,
We believe there is no end to the festive fun you can drive.
A Merry Christmas to you all, we hope it brings you glee,
The Holiday Express is available now for Train Sim World 3!

# Key Features

- A Loop of track in the style of a model railway, set in a 1980s style living room
- Homely details such as a TV, retro games console, books and of course a Christmas Tree!
- Simple-to-drive F7A and F7B locomotive in “Richie Rails” livery
- Caboose, Hopper, and Flat Car, with festive cargo loads
- 7 Scenarios each with unique festive tasks
- Explore the room on foot, using toy-sized elevators to reach different levels
- Recreate your favourite liveries in Livery Designer
- Bring your own rail collections and memories to the room with Scenario Planner
